heroContent.text: Years of experience in web development

hireme.title: Hire me
hireme.subtitle: For you projects
hireme.text: A strong backend development experience and a constant commitment to innovation and learning, I deliver high-quality solutions that drive performance and efficiency. My ability to develop robust APIs, manage databases, optimize performance and ensure security, along with my knowledge of blockchain, make me the ideal candidate to take your projects to the next level.

serviceContent.title: RESTFul API development
serviceContent.para: Creation of programming interfaces for the communication of one or several applications

serviceContent.title: Performance optimization
serviceContent.para: Improvements in efficiency and response speed in applications in addition to identifying performance problems

serviceContent.title: Application security
serviceContent.para: Implementation of security measures to protect the application and user data

contacts.title: Send me a email or follow me in my social media
